markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dogfang Bite](/Feats.aspx?ID=2437) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 58 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Dogtooth Tengu](/Heritages.aspx?ID=111) heritage

</column>

---

You can swing your beak to slash your foes when piercing attacks won't do. Your beak unarmed attack gains the [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200) weapon trait.
name: Dogfang Bite
